intro: Tilingia ajanensis, commonly known as the Ajanensis tilingia, is a rare flowering plant native to specific regions of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Tilingia ajanensis thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical forests. Due to habitat loss, it is considered endangered and is of interest to botanists and conservationists alike.
